quotes.message: An enthusiasm about psychiatry is preposterous—it shows one just hasn’t grown up; but at the same time, for the psychiatrist to be indifferent toward his work is fatal.
quotes.name: Harry Stack Sullivan

quotes.message: Psychiatry enables us to correct our faults by confessing to our parents’ shortcomings.
quotes.name: Peter J. Laurence

quotes.message: Psychiatry is the art of teaching people how to stand on their own feet while reclining on couches.
quotes.name: Sigmund Freud

quotes.message: Psychiatry's chief contribution to philosophy is the discovery that the toilet is the seat of the soul.
quotes.name: Alexander Chase

quotes.message: A neurotic is a man who builds a castle in the air. A psychotic is the man who lives in it. A psychiatrist is the man who collects the rent.
quotes.name: Lord Robert Webb-Johnstone

quotes.message: There is no fun in psychiatry. If you try to get fun out of it, you pay a considerable price for your unjustifiable optimism.
quotes.name: Harry Stack Sullivan

quotes.message: Psychiatrist: A man who asks you a lot of expensive questions your wife asks you for nothing.
quotes.name: Sam Bardell

quotes.message: The new definition of psychiatry is the care of the id by the odd.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: The science of Psychiatry is now where the science of Medicine was before germs were discovered.
quotes.name: Malcolm Rogers

quotes.message: The psychiatrist is the obstetrician of the mind.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: You have to be a psychiatrist too, especially in fashion. A psychologist and a psychiatrist together.
quotes.name: Carolina Herrera

quotes.message: No man is a hero to his wife's psychiatrist.
quotes.name: Eric Berne

quotes.message: Psychiatrist to patient: Maybe you don't have a complex. Maybe you are inferior.
quotes.name: Herbert Stein

quotes.message: The difference between psychiatrists and other mentally disturbed people is something like the relationship between concave and convex madness.
quotes.name: Karl Kraus

quotes.message: There is no psychiatrist in the world like a puppy licking your face.
quotes.name: Bernard Williams

quotes.message: Any man who goes to a psychiatrist ought to have his head examined.
quotes.name: Samuel Goldwyn
